pullRequest.title: Use testcontainers for session property managers

nodes.bodyText:
Having TestingMySqlServer helps to:

wrap using external dependency (in case we would like to switch from testcontainers to something else)
manages which version of mysql is used
it helps to gather common code in single place (like execute(sql) method)

commit.message: Use Dockerized MySQL for session property managers

afterCommit.message: Use Dockerized MySQL for session property managers

nodes.bodyText: was this meant to be extemded?
